import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Form, Button, Row, Col, FormGroup, Image, Card, ListGroup} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector, useStore} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import {saveShippingAddress} from '../actions/cartActions' import Message from '../components/Message' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart=useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Adress: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
